original: Lauritzen, Erling Sigurd Kjeldgaard, disponent, Göteborg, f. 21/4/75 i Ot-tarp, Malmöh. 1., av veter. Lauritz L. o. Christiane Thestrup. G. 08 m. Tora Engberg. Barn: Vera f. 09, g. m. kommendörkapt. L. Gyllenhoff, Gbg, Greta 11, g. m. disp. Axel Siefvert, Sthlm. — Lärov:stud. Anst. inom bok-h :branschen 89-95, v. Gbgs Litograf. A_-B 95-00, Gustaf Melins A-B 00, disp. där 15, efter bolagets uppg. i Sv:es Litograf. Tryckerier verkst. dir. där 19-40. Ombudsman i Gbgs boktr:-fören., ordf. i Stenungsunds Havsbad A-B, Knut Sevaldsens A-B i Köpenh. m. m. RVO, PatrstGM.
translated:
Lauritzen, Erling Sigurd Kjeldgaard, manager, Gothenburg, born on April 21, 1875 in Ottarp, Malmöhus. Son of military veteran Lauritz L. and Christiane Thestrup. Married in 1908 to Tora Engberg. Children: Vera, born in 1909, married to Commander Captain L. Gyllenhoff in Gothenburg, Greta, born in 1911, married to manager Axel Siefvert in Stockholm. 

Education: Student at the Institution for Book Trade 1889-1895, employed at Gbgs Litografiska Aktiebolag 1895-1900, Gustaf Melins Aktiebolag 1900, appointed manager there in 1915, worked as managing director of the company's lithographic printing works in Sweden from 1919 to 1940. Representative in the Gothenburg Bookprinting Association, Chairman of Stenungsunds Havsbad Aktiebolag, Knut Sevaldsens Aktiebolag in Copenhagen etc. Recipient of the Royal Order of Vasa, Patriarchal Grand Master.
